TOOLS PROGRAMMER INTERN What You'll Do We're looking for a Tools Programmer Intern to work on tools and engine components for authoring and rendering terrains within Unreal Engine. This involves working with the current Landscape system and Water tools, supporting internal teams, and licensees, as well as changing existing or developing new features to raise the bar for the terrain capabilities within Unreal Engine. The ideal candidate is self-motivated, has good communication skills, and the abilities and perseverance to analyze and resolve complex problems. In this role, you will • Resolve bugs and workflow issues for our internal teams and licensees • Work closely with the Terrain team members to modify existing and add new features • Debug and test performance critical code on different platforms • Have independence in making and owning implementation decisions Be part of an experienced distributed team • ABOUT US Epic Games spans across 25 countries with 46 studios and 4,500+ employees globally.
